tool_description: Applies validated corrections to original text, handles text reconstruction, maintains formatting, and produces the final corrected version.

original_text.description: Original text to apply corrections to

preserve_formatting.description: Whether to maintain original text formatting

error_messages: Mismatched correction data: corrections and correction_positions must have equal length.
Invalid position data: Correction positions must be within text boundaries.
Overlapping corrections: Multiple corrections cannot target the same text position.
Empty input: Provide original text and at least one correction.
usage: Provide original text, corrections, and positions, optionally preserve formatting. Returns corrected text with change summary.

corrected_text.description: Final text with all corrections applied

changes_summary.description: Summary of changes made to original text

character_count_change.description: Net change in character count after corrections
